oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Postcard entitled "Ein 'Stimmungs-Bild' vor unser Kantine"
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: The photo depicts soldiers sitting in front of a bombproof. Some men have drums and one man has a trumpet. The sign over the center man's head reads "To the Mess Hall." Written on the left side is "a morale photo in front of our mess hall." Written on the right is "Until Seeing Each Other Again!" The card was sent by Cpl. Albin Sommer, 1st Btn., 2nd Btry., 4th (Magdeburg) Foot Art. Regt. and he thanks his sister Ida for the wonderful package she sent and tells her he is doing well. [see GWChat137]
